__e: Right, right, right, I wasn't good enough, but my cave, my tech, my butler, and my city sure were.
He's the one who tried to kill me, who tried to kill your butler... Who probably killed your parents.
I'd like to know when the last time you've seen a boss go to such lengths for his butler, and make such a complete and utter fool of himself?
There's no way a normal butler can kill like this!
Your valet's not here to do it for you.
The Butler will not sleep if I don't read to her.
I know, because I was Mr. Boddy's butler, that the cook had worked for one of you.
Bob, I have known for quite some time that you're not the world's greatest butler, but you at least seemed to care for my kids.
I can't believe Richard's Butler wouldn't let us in!
And you're not really a butler, but you'll be doing C.K.'s job from now on.
If I haven't been able to produce at least one trustworthy butler out of this course, then I've wasted my time.
